reviewText: Challenging. Had to source the gym bar though as didn't come with dvd and it is essential. Michelle bridges sells one for around $40  that is suitable. Unfortunately, a session freezes halfway threw.
I have a mobility disability but find I can do pilates..  Mari Winsor does an excellent presentation which makes this easy to follow.
This DVD requires a weighted bar that gets anchored in a closed door.  DVD isn't much good without that.  Mari is great though, as always.
